madam.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: used to address a woman in a polite way, especially a customer in a shop
madam.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a woman who is in charge of a brothel
madam.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a polite way of addressing a woman, such as a customer in a shop
madam.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: used at the beginning of a business letter to a woman whose name you do not know
madam.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: the title used when addressing a woman who has an important position
